function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Highly contagious COVID-19 disease","Impact":"Potential for rapid spread and high infection rates","Mitigation":"Implement strict public health measures, vaccination, and quarantine protocols","Technologies":"Vaccines, contact tracing apps, and ventilation systems","People":"General population, especially those in densely populated areas","Owner":"Health authorities, government, and public health organizations"}]}
